rooms.description: Open-plan living area with bohemian decor incorporating vibrant colors, eclectic furniture, and artistic elements. Located adjacent to the courtyard for natural lighting.
Cozy dining space integrated within the living area, featuring a reclaimed wood table and vintage decor aligned with bohemian aesthetics.
Modern yet rustic kitchen design blending open shelving, colorful backsplashes, and energy-efficient appliances. Positioned for easy access from the dining area.

Spacious master bedroom with an emphasis on comfort and bohemian style, including decorative wall art, layered textiles, and a private balcony overlooking the courtyard. Vastu principles ensure the headboard faces east for positive energy.
Well-equipped bathroom adjoining the master bedroom with modern fixtures and natural stone accents to maintain bohemian charm.

openings.description: Main entryway designed with warm wood tones and intricate detailing to reflect bohemian style.

openings.location: Center of the layout near living room
openings.description: A large opening leading into a central courtyard that enhances natural ventilation and provides a communal space.
Provides direct access to the two-car garage. Designed with large windows for natural light and security features.

garage.description: Two-car garage located on the north side of the villa, seamlessly integrated into the design with easy access from the courtyard entrance. The design includes sufficient space for parking and storage.

courtyard.name: Central Courtyard
courtyard.description: An open communal space at the center of the villa, promoting natural ventilation, abundant daylighting, and serving as a focal point for relaxation. Features indigenous plants and bohemian-inspired seating arrangements.
